I hate this game. 

This game is one with an extremely entitled, toxic fan base who does not give a single [care] for the other players in the game. The gameplay loop will get repetitive, and solo-queue is one of the most frustrating experiences you will ever have. Unless you're going to be surviving with friends, prepare yourself to be railed time and time again by either your teammates or the opposition. 

With that being said, I have a handful of hours on PC, and I have over 1K on console. This game has its claws rooted deep in me, and I can not take more than a month-long break before I'm right back to it. If you are down for a potential beat down on your psyche until the moment you have enough experience to have a good time, or you want to get up in a game with the homies, this is an addicting game that, although it is a slog, will keep you coming back for more.

After playing this game for an ample amount of hours, I have concluded that this game is the worst, and I mean the worst product I have spent money and time on. The game is ridiculously survivor sided, and almost every instance and memory of the game makes me tilt out of my mind. The developers give a rat's ass about balance, and do not really care about the state of the game.  I would recommend to Instead go play Evil dead, which is a much better alternative compared to this crap example of an assymetrical horror.

oui

this game is very dissapointing and could've been something much more. it's survivor sided as hell and the community has got to be one of the worst i've ever seen

some maps are complete fucking ass, the rubberbanding and lag you get while playing the game causes you to lose track of survivors and fuck up your game, and you get disconnection penalties even though you HAD to disconnect, because of your character being stuck in an animation or your ability being broken

one of the worst parts of the game is the grind, it takes way too long and it's just annoying

its just very frustrating to hop on a game as killer, be gen rushed the shit out of and have to deal with survivors running meta perks and second chance perks like dead hard, which just extends the chase or gives you a pass for fucking up while looping the killer, and they get rewarded for it

it can be satisfying at times, especially if you manage to do good as killer and get a nice down or hit, but alot of the killers take a ton of time to learn and master and most of them end up being nerfed anyways 

i haven't come across many hackers, but I have come across some, and it's sad that the developers don't prioritize fixing the game and prioritize on creating more cosmetics and useless updates which don't help the game in any way

the friends i have made in this game however are pretty nice, and it is rather addicting at times, but there are alot of problems in this game

the playerbase is definitely bad once again, but there are a few nice people, but alot of them are very annoying

i've come across many players who are very toxic, but don't even end up lasting 10 seconds in chase, and usually camp pallets or hold W 

i've already said this but the lag is impossible to ignore, as it fucks up your games as survivor and killer, where randomly when you are playing survivor and looping the killer, your game stutters and you get downed, or when you land a hit on a survivor and it doesn't do anything

i'm very mixed on this game, you can try it out and it is pretty fun when you first start playing, but prepare for super toxic survivors and super sweaty killers in higher ranks

The game is a fun concept and the visual/audio design are both great. You can tell that a lot of care was put into those aspects and the stories of each character. It would be great if the gameplay was given as much consideration. The meta gets pretty stale after a while and playing off meta, while fun sometimes, struggles to actually get results. Overall, the game can be fun if you don't care about winning but if you do its more stressful than fun.

[h1] 游戏时常2500小时 [/h1]
作为第一批的老玩家，我只能说我被当时的这种玩法和恐怖氛围所吸引。
[h1] 关于游戏 [/h1]
1: 我只能说这是一款非常优秀的非对称对抗游戏，[b] 没有之一 [/b]！
2: 游戏的难度说不上简单与复杂，完全依靠玩家自己对游戏的理解以及些许的运气[spoiler] 比如遇到外挂 [/spoiler]和心里承受能力。
3: 游戏的服务器和网络一直都是这款游戏的病症。[spoiler] 尤其是没了国服以后 [/spoiler]
4: 游戏画面虽然有极高画质的选项，但是还是推荐玩家用低或者中等画质进行游戏！
5: 游戏的匹配机制对目前玩家来说还是并不友好，尤其是对新手玩家而言，常常会面临屠夫玩家水平高于自己的时候。所以，当进行这款游戏时，死亡是常态，但不要放弃每一次能存活下来的机会！
[h1] 最后 [/h1]不管是新玩家还是老玩家，请放平心态游玩这款游戏[spoiler] 不要去开挂 [/spoiler]

[h1] 关于游戏中人类 [/h1]
1: 如果你是新手玩家，并且对这款游戏感兴趣，而不是只是来看看或者尝尝鲜的话，我很推荐你能在前期游戏的过程中找到一到两个在游戏中实力较强的朋友[spoiler] 并不能通过时常来判断，因为时间只能证明他的游玩时间而已 [/spoiler]这对你的帮助很大。不仅能让你快速成长，也能告诉你游戏中常要注意的知识以及给你解决你不懂的问题。
2: 有些屠夫会因为你的ID是中文或者看个人资料知道你是中国人，从而游戏中只杀你。如果发生这种事，希望你不要生气，因为这不是游戏的问题，而是当局屠夫玩家的问题。所以，提升自己的实力，让打你针对的屠夫玩家知道，你并不是好惹的！
3: 请记住，这个游戏单排和四排是两个不同的游戏体验，如果你想更快的提高自己的技术，那么在你从实力较强的朋友口中知道了大部分对局中需要注意到的事情的时候，你就大胆的去进行单排吧！那将是你最快成长的方法，没有之一！

[h1] 关于游戏中屠夫 [/h1]
1: 当前版本人类修机速度过快，加上不友好的匹配机制，可能会导致新手屠夫游戏体验很差[spoiler] 人类其实也是 [/spoiler]。
2: 屠夫玩法相比于人类来说可选择性高出很多，建议爱玩屠夫的你有条件的话可以多拥有一些屠夫，找到最适合自己的那些屠夫。
3: 很多人类会给屠夫定很多规矩[spoiler] 比如不能守尸，带高配玩不起，打针对玩不起之类的 [/spoiler]，但是游戏的玩法里并没有规定不能这样做，所以，不要被这种言论过多影响。如果你喜欢这样玩，那就去做，是你在玩这款游戏，而不是在玩他们口中的游戏。[spoiler] 这条可能会有人说我不该这样教，但我只针对游戏而说 [/spoiler]

[h1] 最后 [/h1]
死亡不是解脱，祝各位游戏愉快

I bought this game and ive effectively started binge watching how to improve my game play just bc i find it so fun. BUT keep in mind this game can be VERY tedious to some as the game is essentially "try to repair a generator, and watch out for skill checks. then run away from killer" and repeat until all 5 generators are complete then unlock exit and leave. now while this might seem extremely boring after a while. after 94 hours i still play and i think its very fun. while the often times u might get a bad team or a really good/unfair killer, the other aspects of the game keep me playing as it has many other tips and tricks that you can learn and use to your advantage and after 94 hours of mostly in game play. i have to say very fun ESPECIALLY with friends!
